Posted By: Control_Inspired (8/18/2013 10:44:59 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Silence9  
  
You can try to justify it all you want; she's still too underpowered for her casting cost to see use. There are good token lords for EDH that play much better than her. (See: [Rhys the Redeemed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rhys the Redeemed), [Tolsimir Wolfblood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tolsimir Wolfblood))  
  
...Also, why bother drawing Go For The Throats when we can just Wrath of God / Day of Judgment / Damnation all of them instead? Asceticism does jack shit against board wipes.  
  
There's a big difference between wanting every creature to be ridiculous for its cost and wanting every creature to be actually useful for its cost. This is a 5/7 with an ability that has almost no effect outside of combat and who has no removal protection whatsoever. She's even in two creature colors, and she's still below the curve.  
  
Really, Emmara isn't going to be staying around very long in EDH. Yeah, she's a fun card to play around with, but she's still not very good.
posts.html:
@Silence9

There's a big difference between wanting every creature to be ridiculous for its cost and wanting every creature to be actually useful for its cost. This is a 5/7 with an ability that has almost no effect outside of combat and who has no removal protection whatsoever. She's even in two creature colors, and she's still below the curve.

Really, Emmara isn't going to be staying around very long in EDH. Yeah, she's a fun card to play around with, but she's still not very good.

posts.post_content:
I for one can't wait to see the Wizards article that talks about how secretly awesome and Jonny-tastic this card is.  
  
"Okay, guys, I know what you're thinking. But you can use her with cards that care about highest converted mana cost! And she's soooo much harder to hit with the deadly new [Gaze of Granite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaze of Granite)! And...wait, this is super secret tech here...you can ENCHANT HER. Or even, if you're really willing to splash for colorless, you can even try out some equipment. [Hedron Matrix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hedron Matrix), anyone? And if you reanimate her, hoo doggy, now you're just getting KUH-RAZY."  
  
Also, I like the flavor text. We too will put the ranks of the guild before you, Emmara.

posts.post_content:
So I just had to check...  
  
Being a Selesnya follower since Ravnica was introduced, and white green before that... I just had to check how Emmara rated compared to the rest of the cards in Magic.  
  
Out of 13378 cards, she is currently the 208th worst card by our community's rating standards. That's the bottom 0.5% of all magic cards.   
  
  
...What even was Wizards thinking? Limited to 10 Mythics does not give an excuse for this terrible atrocity.

Posted By: Jake1991 (4/23/2013 6:43:43 PM)

posts.post_content:
My only thought for using her effectively is to somehow put a token of her into play, so that she prevents all damage done to herself.  
  
It's weird how this dainty little creature is 5/7. I mean think about it... she can take a punch from a titan and just wipe her bloody nose, spit her dislodged tooth onto the floor and come back ready for round two.  
  
In my head, she's being repeatedly knocked around the squared circle by Apollo Creed dressed in a tutu and high on crystal meth, but somehow she just *doesn't go down*. Not that I'm praising the performance at all... I just enjoy seeing her being beaten up because of how awful this card is.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
Nucleon... you don't know how right you were.  
  
http://www.wizards.com/Magic/Magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtg/daily/ct/245  
  
Almost every single card they mention in this article is something that works much better with creatures other than Emmara — indeed, most of it works better with [Avacyn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn), which they do note in the article and then promptly ignore. While they are willing to admit Emmara was an underpowered mistake, they apparently still want us to play her when there are much better options.

posts.post_content:
Now that Theros is out, I thought I would take a moment to mention. The following is a Hilarious list of cards that Emmara can block all day long, or even kill in some cases.  
  
[Arbor Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arbor Colossus): Giant: Emmara can block this GIANT all day long.  
[Shipbreaker Kraken](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shipbreaker Kraken): Kraken: Unleash the Emmara! As long as it isn't Monstrous and/or using it's monstrous ability to lock down Emmara, she can block the Kraken forever.  
[Hundred-Handed One](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hundred-Handed One): Giant: If Hundred Handed one became Monstrous, Emmara could STILL block it all day long.  
[Polukranos, the World Eater](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Polukranos, the World Eater): Hydra: Does the World Eater have the stomach to swallow Emmara whole? If you're willing to pay (2)(2)(G) for his monstrous cost, he gains the 7 power necessary to wrestle our heroine. But can he swallow her whole? It would cost 15 Mana for Polukranos to gobble her up while activating Monstrous. By that point, he's a 19/19.   
Finally, EVERY. SINGLE. THEROSAN. G... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
You guys are fools. I will rock your world with her as my general any day of the week. Unless you can consistently draw murders and day of judgments and go for the throats you are dead. There's no way you're packing enough removal to take out the swarms of tokens I have. And with Asceticism I'm pretty much invincible. Don't bash her until you make an edh deck with her. 4/5  
  
@ lostmongoose  
  
Avacyn is a whole different card all together. First of all she's mono white, so she makes for a bad general, all of the good tokens are green, and she is also mythic rarity. You guys are so spoiled and short sighted to be able to construct around a card and have fun with it. You can't fudging think every Magic card should be like Phyrexian Obliterator, 4 mana for 5/5 with two upsides. Get real...
